Index.title: Next 15 Template with i18n and Shadcn UI
Index.description: A powerful starting point for your next multilingual, accessible web application.
Index.OmitRTLInstruction: To use OmitRTL, simply wrap the component you want to omit RTL support for with the OmitRTL component.

Metadata.title: Next.js i18n Template - Multilingual Starter Template
Metadata.description: Next.js internationalization (i18n) starter kit with Arabic, Chinese, English, Spanish, and Japanese support. Includes shadcn UI, theme switching, and RTL support.
Metadata.keywords: Next.js, i18n, internationalization, Arabic, Chinese, Spanish, Japanese, multilingual, template, starter template, shadcn UI, RTL support

Contact.title: Get in Touch with
Contact.description: Whether you have a specific shipping inquiry, need a comprehensive logistics consultation, or want to explore partnership opportunities, our global team is ready to assist you.
Contact.messagePlaceholder: Please describe your logistics needs or question in detail. Include information like type of goods, origin/destination, estimated volume/frequency, etc.

Testimonial.title: Trusted by Businesses Worldwide
Testimonial.description: Hear directly from our valued clients who rely on Atik Logistics for their critical import/export operations and global supply chain management.

testimonials.text: Atik Logistics has revolutionized our international supply chain. Their proactive communication and efficient customs handling saved us significant time and costs. Truly a reliable partner for global expansion.

The team at Atik Logistics consistently goes above and beyond. Their expertise in handling perishable goods via their cold chain solutions is unmatched. We've seen a noticeable improvement in delivery times and product integrity.

As a growing business expanding into new international markets, Atik Logistics provided the crucial guidance and tailored support we needed. Their personalized service made a complex import/export process feel simple and manageable.

We entrusted Atik Logistics with a complex project cargo shipment of oversized machinery. Their meticulous planning, execution, and on-site coordination were flawless. Highly recommended for any challenging logistics needs.

AboutUs.aboutUsText: At Atik Logistics, we are more than just a service provider; we are your strategic partner in navigating the global marketplace. Our journey began over fifteen years ago, fueled by a commitment to innovation, customer-centricity, and sustainable practices. We specialize in delivering exceptional import and export solutions, connecting businesses to new opportunities with efficiency and unwavering reliability. Trust us to build the pathways for your global success.
AboutUs.subDescription: Atik Logistics is dedicated to simplifying international trade. We provide comprehensive import/export services, leveraging cutting-edge technology and a global network to ensure your cargo moves seamlessly and efficiently across borders.

Hero.imageAlt: Global logistics network concept with interconnected lines over a world map
Hero.headline2: Streamlining Global Trade, Delivering Your World.
Hero.description: Navigate the complexities of international shipping with Atik Logistics. We offer comprehensive, technology-driven solutions for seamless import, export, and supply chain management, connecting your business to markets worldwide with unparalleled efficiency and reliability.

Services.headline: End-to-End Logistics for a Connected World
Services.description: At Atik Logistics, we provide a comprehensive suite of import/export services designed to optimize your supply chain, reduce complexities, and propel your business forward on the global stage.

features.name: Global Freight Forwarding
features.description: Seamless air, sea, and land freight solutions connecting your business to over 180 countries. We ensure optimized routes, competitive rates, and timely deliveries for all cargo types.
features.altText: Atik Logistics truck fleet moving cargo on a highway

features.name: Smart Warehousing & Fulfillment
features.description: Secure, strategically located warehousing with advanced inventory management, order fulfillment, and value-added services like kitting and cross-docking.
features.altText: Interior of a modern Atik Logistics warehouse with automated systems

features.name: Global Trade Visibility
features.description: End-to-end shipment tracking via our unified digital platform. Gain real-time insights, predictive ETAs, and custom reporting for full supply chain transparency.
features.altText: Digital interface showing global shipment tracking for Atik Logistics

features.name: Customs Brokerage & Compliance
features.description: Expert navigation of complex international trade regulations. Our licensed brokers ensure swift customs clearance, duty optimization, and full compliance.
features.altText: Container ship being loaded at a port, symbolizing Atik Logistics customs operations

features.name: Specialized & Project Cargo
features.description: Tailored logistics for oversized, hazardous, perishable, or high-value goods. We manage complex project cargo with precision from planning to delivery.
features.altText: Specialized heavy machinery being transported, representing Atik Logistics project cargo services

Team.description: Our dedicated team of seasoned logistics professionals combines deep industry experience with a passion for innovative solutions, ensuring your cargo is always in the most capable hands.

members.name: Alexandre Moreau
members.description: With over 20 years in global trade and supply chain innovation, Alexandre leads Atik Logistics with a vision for seamless, technology-driven logistics ecosystems that empower international businesses.

members.name: Priya Sharma
members.description: Priya is an expert in optimizing international freight operations and ensuring strict customs compliance. Her strategic oversight guarantees efficiency and reliability across our vast global network.

members.name: Kenji Tanaka
members.description: Kenji spearheads the development of Atik Logistics' proprietary digital platform, integrating AI and IoT to provide clients with unparalleled shipment visibility and predictive analytics.

highlights.altText: Temperature-controlled cargo containers for Atik Logistics pharmaceutical shipments
highlights.title: Pharmaceutical & Cold Chain Logistics
highlights.description: Atik Logistics provides validated, GDP-compliant cold chain solutions for pharmaceuticals and temperature-sensitive goods, ensuring product integrity from origin to destination with real-time monitoring.

highlights.altText: Atik Logistics coordinating heavy machinery transport for an industrial project
highlights.title: Industrial Project Cargo Management
highlights.description: Expert handling of heavy lift, out-of-gauge, and complex project cargo. Atik Logistics offers turnkey solutions including route surveys, specialized equipment, and on-site coordination for industrial projects.

highlights.altText: Sustainable packaging materials used by Atik Logistics for eco-friendly shipping
highlights.title: Sustainable & Green Logistics
highlights.description: Committed to reducing environmental impact, Atik Logistics offers carbon-neutral shipping options, route optimization for fuel efficiency, and sustainable packaging solutions for eco-conscious businesses.

highlights.altText: E-commerce packages being processed in an Atik Logistics fulfillment center
highlights.title: E-commerce Fulfillment & Last-Mile Delivery
highlights.description: Integrated solutions for online retailers, including inventory management, pick-and-pack services, and efficient last-mile delivery networks to enhance customer satisfaction and accelerate growth.

Summary.title: Building Global Connections, Delivering Value
Summary.description: Atik Import Export specializes in seamless international logistics and distribution of high-quality cleaning and care products. We connect businesses worldwide with reliable, secure, and timely solutions.

features.title: Fast & Reliable
features.description: Timely, secure, and efficient delivery across the globe.

features.title: Specialized Expertise
features.description: Deep knowledge in handling cleaning and care products logistics.

features.title: Trust & Security
features.description: Transparent, dependable, and secure handling of your goods.

features.title: Customer-Centric
features.description: Tailored solutions and dedicated support for every client.

FeatureAccordion.title: Why Choose Atik Import Export?
FeatureAccordion.description: We offer end-to-end logistics, truck transportation, and soon, direct product sourcing—all with a focus on trust, integrity, and customer satisfaction.

items.title: International Logistics
items.content: Comprehensive global shipping for cleaning and care products, ensuring safe and timely delivery.

items.title: Truck Transportation
items.content: Modern fleet and expert team for cost-effective, secure regional transport.

items.title: Distribution (Coming Soon)
items.content: Direct access to premium cleaning and care products through our expanding import-export channels.

items.title: Partnership & Growth
items.content: Long-term, collaborative relationships for mutual success and international expansion.

Stats.title: Atik Import Export in Numbers
Stats.description: Our impact and reach in the global cleaning and care products sector.

LogoCloud.title: Trusted by Leading Brands
LogoCloud.description: Our partners and clients span the globe, reflecting our commitment to quality and reliability.

Story.title: Our Story: Bridging Markets, Creating Opportunities
Story.description: Founded on trust, hard work, and integrity, Atik Import Export has grown into a vital link between international markets. We turn opportunities into achievements for our clients.
